name: Velocity Legends - Crazy Car Action Racing Game
name_original: Velocity Legends - Crazy Car Action Racing Game
description:
FULL GAME
- No DLC, No In App Purchase
- Will include all feature updates

AN EXPERIENCE IN THE PALMS OF YOUR HANDS
Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action racing games, with cool cars, amazing, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every race into a real blockbuster race movie.

CUSTOMISATION AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Use the new car editor to define the exact color and material of your car. You can modify headlight, rear light, spoiler, roof vent, tyres, rims and top body.

A BLAST OF ARCADE FUN
Charge your nitro to unleash the ultimate Mega Boost for the ultimate boost of speed you need to make your car break the sound barrier! Tap spin to do a 360° at any time to take down your opponents in style and watch the burnout behind you in slow motion! Get into action with mega vehicles blasting. Action is in your hand, trigger powerplay to take down your opponents with explosions!

BECOME A STREET LEGEND
Start your street journey in Career mode by completing over seasons. And become a real Asphalt Crazy racer legend by racing against up to 7 rival players.

The perfect game for fans of free arcade racing games!
